nodes.text: Urur was a male Tusken Raider who lived on the desert planet of Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War. He was the younger brother of the Tusken Raider Ur. Urur was restricted to defending his tribe. If Ur was killed, Urur would take his older brother's place. Urur wore desert-colored robes, and the standard Tusken mask. He wielded a Gaderffii.
Urur was first mentioned on a card for the Premiere set of Decipher, Inc.'s 2001 Jedi Knights Trading Card Game.
